pr_title: Ensure the epoch is known prior to attempting to perform duties.

timeline.message:
verify the unsigned data returned for signing is for the expected slot

partially addresses #3154

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

Ensure the epoch is known prior to attempting to perform duties.

If the current epoch is not known, then it is possible to sign something that is invalid, for example too far in the future.

fixes #3154

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                  LOG.info(
          
          
            
                      "current epoch {} could not be verified against the current slot {}, not processing attestation duty",
          
          
            
                      getCurrentEpoch().map(UInt64::toString).orElse("UNDEFINED"),
          
          
            
                      slot);
          
          
            
                  LOG.info(
          
          
            
                      "Not performing attestation duties for slot {} because it is too far ahead of the current slot {}",
          
          
            
                      slot,
          
          
            
                      getCurrentEpoch().map(UInt64::toString).orElse("UNDEFINED"));
